channel.title: Permission to make Auxy original demo remix? (Winston)
channel.description:
The original Auxy demo when it was before all the automation and stuff was my most favourite of the four original demos, and I was thinking or making a remix, but it was @Auxy and the team who made the project. So I was wondering if I could make a post out a remix of it, while crediting the team in the title of it.
Title: Auxy - Winston (RazerFireRiot Remix) [Dance]
